title: Short Games For Windows
description:
Brick - klotski - Pegged - Puzzle - Tetravex - Tic - Checkers

They are very old nice short games working on Windows 3 ,  I discovered lately when I was searching my old stuff that they work on Windows XP as well . I like them very much and use them often with spider solataire . No key needed no installation required , they just run from the exe file . Please check for viruses , I have no virus progs and I dont care .
